p: The title compound as a single enantiomer, was obtained by chiral HPLC separation of Example 117 and is the second enantiomer to elute: MS (APCI): 625 (M+H) +. 1H NMR (400 MHz, CD 3OD): δ 8.61 (d, 1H); 8.42 (d, 1H); 8.22 (d, 1H); 8.00 (s, 1H); 7.85 (d, 1H); 7.79 (s, 1H); 7.69 (d, 1H); 7.49 (m, 2H); 7.43 (m, 2H); 7.30 (t, 1H); 7.09 (m, 4H); 6.63 (d, 1 H); 4.33 (m, 1 H); 2.74 (s, 3H); 1.73 (d, 3H).
